1848410.name: FEAR: Call of the village
1848410.detailed_description:
FEAR: Call of the village is a first-person horror game made in realistic 3D graphics that immerses you in an atmosphere of horror and fears you. The gameplay consists in collecting notes, solving riddles and escaping from ghosts, as well as in other mechanics inherent in any horror in order to survive and escape.

In it you have to get into a mysterious village and solve various riddles, the solution of which will be hindered by various inexplicable phenomena by science. Also, to complete the game, you will have to collect the necessary items that may come in handy in the passage or even be necessary. Meet the new protagonist, screamers and storyline!

Brief background:

The main character, an ordinary unremarkable guy, found himself in a rather strange abandoned village. At first glance, this place does not repulse at all, but even "pleases" the eye, however, as he progresses, the main character encounters many ghosts and other otherworldly creatures and phenomena. Therefore, more and more cute village ceases to be like a cozy place, and every next minute spent in it convinces you that you need to quickly get out of this God-forsaken place!

You have to overcome your fear, going through gloomy locations for the main character, solving various puzzles along the way and trying to understand what is going on in general, how you got here, and most importantly, how to get out of this enchanted village.

By purchasing the game you will get the best emotions that you have never received!

1848410.supported_languages:
English, Russian*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Thai, Turkish, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

1848440.name: Foolish Mortals
1848440.detailed_description:
DEVIL'S ROCK
An island off the coast of Louisiana
1932

“Ever since I heard of the treasure inside Bellemore Manor I've been obsessed by it. People said the house was still haunted by the ghosts of the wedding that disappeared there decades ago, but if the ghosts knew where the treasure was hidden, I just had to ask them.

But there's more to the treasure than I could have ever expected, and now I've awakened a household of spirits who don't mind that they're dead, and an evil phantom determined to find the treasure before I do.

Fixing the situation won't just mean getting to the treasure first, but also figuring out what happened on the island all those years ago. But I have a feeling that in order to do that, I'll have to die too.”

- The Diary of Murphy McCallan

  • Classic adventure game puzzles, with over 100 useable items, and a built-in hint system
  • Over 65 gorgeous hand-drawn locations at full HD resolution, plus dozens more full-screen paintings, documents, and other details to investigate.
  • More than 30 fully voiced characters to interact with, and two hours of original music

1848440.short_description: Obsessed with finding the lost treasure of Bellemore Manor, Murphy McCallan encounters ghosts, voodoo, and an evil Phantom who wants the treasure as their own! Eccentric characters and exciting puzzles populate the mysterious island of Devil’s Rock in this classic style point & click adventure.
